div.p: This extension defines a polygon line annotation to an image

ul.li: opacity - this is the optical opacity of the line. What are its units and range???
color- this is the color of the line. What are its units and range???
style - this is the style of the line. What are its units and range???
thickness- this is the thicknedd of the line. What are its units and range???

coordinates- A series of points, each of which is an x,y point of the polygonal line. Each point is a string of the format "{d},{d}" where d is a fhir decimal string, and each point is seperated from the next by a space.
